thread.title: African Startup Plans Hybrid Car Line
thread.title_full: African Startup Plans Hybrid Car Line - WSJ

author: Nicholas Bariyo
title: African Startup Plans Hybrid Car Line
text:
KAMPALA, Uganda—Each prototype car that rolls off Kiira Motors Corp.’s assembly line moves Chief Executive Paul Isaac Musasizi closer to his dream of building Africa’s first homegrown family of electric vehicles.
The electrical engineer says his factory on the outskirts of Uganda’s capital annually could build 7,000 of its EV Smack sedan and a 37-passenger van by 2018. “We are on course,” Mr. Musasizi, 36 years old, says as he...
